item.uo_uo_no_mi.uo_uo_no_mi_model_seiry: Uo Uo no Mi, Model: Seiryu
ability.uo_uo_no_mi.boro_breath.descript: User creates huge fire attack destroying anything on its way
ability.uo_uo_no_mi.kaen_daiko.descripti: User Coats himself with fire, dealing damage to everyone coming close
ability.uo_uo_no_mi.seiryu_fly_point.des: User Transforms into flying dragon, giving him great resistance and damage boost
ability.uo_uo_no_mi.seiryu_heavy_point.d: User Transforms into dragon-human Hybrid, giving him extreme resistance and damage boost
ability.uo_uo_no_mi.shoryu_kaen_hakke.de: Blazing Hot User flights towards enemy at great speeds, scorching all around
